params.account: The user for which the vesting should be added
params.amount: Amount of tokens that should be vested in wei
params.curveType: Type of the curve that should be used for the vesting
params.durationWeeks: The duration of the vesting in weeks
params.initialUnlock: Amount of tokens that should be unlocked initially in wei
params.managed: Whether the vesting should be managed or not
params.startDate: The date when the vesting should be started (can be in the past)

returns._0: The id of the vesting that was created

params.user: The user for which the vesting pool address should be returned

returns._0: The vesting pool address for the user

addVesting(address,uint8,bool,uint16,uin.notice: Add a vesting to the vesting pool of the user

getVestingPool(address).notice: Get the vesting pool for the user or revert if it does not exist
